statusList.Name: Poison
statusList.Description: Gradually reduces enemy health over 3 turns.

statusList.Name: Confused
statusList.Description: Lowers enemy dexterity by 20%, increasing their chance to miss attacks for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Stunned
statusList.Description: Stuns the target, making them unable to act for 1 turn.

statusList.Name: Slowed
statusList.Description: Reduces target's speed by 30%, decreasing their evasion and attack speed for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Burned
statusList.Description: Inflicts burn on the target, dealing 7 damage over 3 turns.

statusList.Name: Disoriented
statusList.Description: Reduces target's intelligence by 25%, affecting their ability to use abilities for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Blinded
statusList.Description: Blinds the enemy, significantly increasing their chance to miss attacks for 1 turn.

statusList.Name: Weakened
statusList.Description: Weakens the enemy, reducing their attack damage by 15% for 3 turns.

statusList.Name: Teleported
statusList.Description: Instantly moves the player to a random location. One-time effect.

statusList.Name: Disarmed
statusList.Description: Disarms the enemy, preventing them from attacking for 1 turn.

statusList.Name: Crushed
statusList.Description: Crushes the enemy under immense pressure, dealing 10 damage over 2 turns.
